nodes.text: A safe house on the planet Balmorra was one of the few dozens safe houses set up and maintained across the galaxy by the Imperial Intelligence doctor Eckard Lokin during the Cold War. He monitored all his safe houses as a matter of precaution, and security within was quite high. Around 3640 BBY three assassins affiliated with Colonel Langor of the Imperial Science Bureau attempted the wire the safe house with explosives. However, Lokin's security measures performed as designed and the house exploded, burning to the ground along with the bodes of the assassins.
Eckard Lokin's Balmorra safe house is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during Eckard Lokin's companion storyline.
